pullRequest.title: CB-8328. Implemented service type tagging for DataHub
pullRequest.bodyText:
later after the new metering heartbeat application is ready and burned on our images, we will use this custom tag to fill MeteringConfigView object to fill its serviceType field
more details in the commit message

beforeCommit.message:
CB-8328. Implemented service type provider interface for DataHub

details:
- add new cluster template related tag with name "Cloudera-Service-Type"
- add a new service type resolver which is called during stack creation from stack request
- tags can be used by other application in order to use  "Cloudera-Service-Type" (as desired service type)
- sewrvice type resolver contins different ServiceTypeMatcher interfaces - run all custom logic on those
- service types needs to be validated based on the matchers logic (input is the cmtemplate processor)
- for adding a new provider -> add a new value for ServiceType enum and provide an implementation for ServiceTypeMatcher

nodes.bodyText: maybe in case the user could not specify the servicetype then we should check the stack.type. What do you think?

beforeCommit.message:
CB-8328. Implemented service type provider interface for DataHub

details:
- add new cluster template related tag with name "Cloudera-Service-Type"
- add a new service type resolver which is called during stack creation from stack request
- tags can be used by other application in order to use  "Cloudera-Service-Type" (as desired service type)
- sewrvice type resolver contins different ServiceTypeMatcher interfaces - run all custom logic on those
- service types needs to be validated based on the matchers logic (input is the cmtemplate processor)
- for adding a new provider -> add a new value for ServiceType enum and provide an implementation for ServiceTypeMatcher

afterCommit.message:
CB-8328. Implemented service type provider interface for DataHub

details:
- add new cluster template related tag with name "Cloudera-Service-Type"
- add a new service type resolver which is called during stack creation from stack request
- service resolver will use a static json template where we can determine which service type should be used (based on only services for now, can be extended component/configurations later, but only if that will be needed)
- service type resolver only called if no provided application tag
- if application tag is not provided, the result service type from service type resolver will be used as the application tag, therefore we will have the information in the api response

commit.message:
CB-8328. Implemented service type provider interface for DataHub

details:
- add new cluster template related tag with name "Cloudera-Service-Type"
- add a new service type resolver which is called during stack creation from stack request
- service resolver will use a static json template where we can determine which service type should be used (based on only services for now, can be extended component/configurations later, but only if that will be needed)
- service type resolver only called if no provided application tag
- if application tag is not provided, the result service type from service type resolver will be used as the application tag, therefore we will have the information in the api response
